Package com.ata

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
com.ata.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Static utility methods for use with Elements or other classes.

    • getBlock

      public static char getBlock(int group, int period)
      Returns the periodic table block of the element.
      Parameters:
      group - the periodic table group of the element using the IUPAC numbering system (1-18).
      period - the periodic table period of the element
      Returns:
      the periodic table block of the element.

    • alternateElementName

      public static String alternateElementName(String name)

    • groupToMendeleev

      public static String groupToMendeleev(int group)
      Returns the periodic table group in Mendeleev format, (I, II, III, IV, V, etc.). Example:
       groupToMendeleev(Elements.BR.group())
      will return VII.
      Parameters:
      group - the integer using the IUPAC numbering system (1-18) group of the element.
      Returns:
      the element group in Mendeleev Roman numeral format.

    • groupToCAS

      public static String groupToCAS(int group)
      Returns the periodic table group in CAS Roman numeral format, (IA, IIA, IIIB, IVB, VB, etc.). Example:
       groupToCAS(Elements.BR.group())
      will return VIIA.
      Parameters:
      group - the integer using the IUPAC numbering system (1-18) group of the element.
      Returns:
      the element group in CAS Roman numeral format.

    • groupToOldIUPAC

      public static String groupToOldIUPAC(int group)
      Returns the periodic table group in old IUPAC Roman numeral format, (IA, IIA, IIIA, IVA, VA, etc.). Example:
       groupToOldIUPAC(Elements.BR.group())
      will return VIIB.
      Parameters:
      group - the integer using the new IUPAC numbering system (1-18) group of the element.
      Returns:
      the element group in old IUPAC Roman numeral format.
